titleStmt.title: The catechisme of the Church of England explain'd [b]y short questions and answers for the use of the [Eng]lish church in Rotterdam, by [L]uke Milbourne, Presbyter and pastor there.
titleStmt.author: Milbourne, Luke, 1649-1720.

notesStmt.note: Copy tightly bound and trimmed at head, with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
